variable.name: hud_tp_need
variable.description: Toggles connection of tp_need_* variables with hud elements.

boolean.true: Numbers in HUD get red when they are lower than appropriate tp_need_* values.
boolean.false: Numbers in HUD elements get red when below standard values.

variable.remarks: E.g.: Use with 'tp_need_health 40' and your health indicator will display red numbers if your health is 40 or lower.
